name: Zombies Again
description:
Zombies Again is a super cool very awesome project I have been working on

to summarize the gameplay loop, take COD Zombies, and make it fun again, then you have Zombies Again.

The game is very early in development and you may encounter some unintended features.

Controls:

WASD: Move

Space: Jump

Shift: Sprint

L Ctrl: Crouch

F: Interact

V: Melee

X/Scroll Wheel: Change weapon

R: Reload (and to start the game once loaded in multiplayer)

T: Inspect weapon (L-Click to cancel)

Mouse: Gun stuff

5: Pause (temporary)
